ENS Content Resolver

This extensions resolves any .eth address that has an IPFS hash registered as content hash and redirects your browser to the content.

Try it out by entering e.g. monkybrain.eth in your browser's address bar.

Currently only works with Infura and IPFS gateway. Support for local Ethereum and IPFS nodes will arrive in the next release.

You can find the repo for this project here.

Feedback of any kind would be much appreciated.
